stimulusHtml:
. . . . glutamine-glutamine-glutamine . . .

. . . serine-serine-serine . . .

Which of the following messenger RNA sequences could code for both of the two amino acid sequences above, simply by a shift in the reading frame?

features.html: • Directions: Each group of questions below concerns an experimental or laboratory situation or data. In each case, first study the description of the situation or data. Then choose the one best answer to each question following it.
